fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Consumers, Single market, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: As a financial institution with a global scope and an ambitious technology strategy, DNB is heavily impacted by regulations adopted at the EU level, spanning both banking supervision and capital market regulations as well as digital regulations.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Commission expert group on electronic identification and remote Know-Your-Customer processes#E03571#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3571#Member#C
membership: Finance Norway (www.finansnorge.no) which in turn is a member of the European Banking Federation (www.ebf-fbe.eu).
goals__remit: DNB is Norway's largest financial services group and one of the largest in the Nordic region in terms of market capitalisation. We offer a full range of financial services, including loans, savings, advisory services, insurance and pension products for retail and corporate customers.
